channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: New In JM Home by Julien MacDonald
channel.desc: Introduce a touch of glamour into your home with JM by Julien Macdonald. From sophisticated home furnishings to fabulous accessories, discover fresh designs that will transform your space.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Tili Beauty
channel.desc: Effortlessly update your daily beauty routine with Tili, from beauty tools and everyday essentials, to expert developed fitness and wellbeing items, we've got you covered. Try it, love it with Tili.

channel.title: Judith Williams Beauty
channel.desc: American-born opera singer and actress Judith Williams originally studied cosmetic science, and has decided to use her expertise and knowledge to create her own pampering skincare range.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Beauty Tools & Accessories
channel.desc: The beauty tools you use are as important as your products, so enjoy professional-standard implements and accessories, from lash curlers to make-up bags and tweezers to brushes.
